Package impl.calculators

Class CalculatorAdvanced

  • java.lang.Object
    • impl.calculators.Calculator
      • impl.calculators.CalculatorAdvanced
  • public class CalculatorAdvanced
extends Calculator
    Version:
    1.0 Class that extends Calculator and provides additional operations that include: power, factorial, checking for Armstrong and perfect number.
    Author:
    njego

    • Constructor Detail

      • CalculatorAdvanced

    • Method Detail

      • calculateAdvanced

        public void calculateAdvanced​(char action)
                       throws NumberNotInAreaException,
                              NotSupportedOperationException
        Parameters:
        action - Action that will be performed (! - Factorial or values 1 - 9 for power of current calculator value.
        Throws:
        NumberNotInAreaException - Will be thrown if current value is less than 0 or greater than 10 in case of calculating factorial.
        NotSupportedOperationException - Will be thrown if provided action is not '!' or single digit. Stores result in current value.

      • hasCharacteristic

        public java.lang.Boolean hasCharacteristic​(char value)
                                    throws NumberNotInAreaException,
                                           NotSupportedOperationException
        Parameters:
        value - Character that specifies characterisitc to be checked ('A' for Armstrong, 'P' for perfect number)
        Returns:
        True if current value is of the provided type, else false.
        Throws:
        NumberNotInAreaException - Will be thrown if current value is less than 1.
        NotSupportedOperationException - Will be thrown if specified char is not 'A' or 'P'.
